title: How's your day going?
body:
Anything crazy awesome things of note happen recently? Just typing away over here on my work and figured I'd pop in to say hello :)

Things that have made me happy today:

* The feeling that work is getting done and I'm on track
* Knowing I now have a closet full of clean clothes (finally)
* Watching my friends play the new urf mode

Things that have made me less than happy today:

* Having to schedule a dentist appointment >.<
